EnableStamina.name: Enable for stamina
EnableStamina.tooltip: Enable automatically consume food for stamina.
StaminaThreshold.name: Stamina threshold
StaminaThreshold.tooltip: Stamina threshold at which the player will automatically consume food.
DynamicStaminaThreshold.name: Dynamic stamina threshold
DynamicStaminaThreshold.tooltip: Use dynamic stamina threshold depending on current tool costs.
EnableHealth.name: Enable for health
EnableHealth.tooltip: Enable automatically consume food for health.
HealthThreshold.name: Health threshold
HealthThreshold.tooltip: Health threshold at which the player will automatically consume food.
PreferHigherInventory.name: Prefer higher inventory food
PreferHigherInventory.tooltip: Among equally cheap (salePrice / Energy) foods, prefer foods with higher inventory.
ExcludedFoods.name: Excluded Foods
ExcludedFoods.tooltip: Foods to exclude from auto eat, food names are separated by commas.
ToggleAutoBuffKey.name: Auto eat for buff key map
EnableCoffee.name: Auto drink coffee
EnableCoffee.tooltip: Auto drink coffee or Triple Shot Espresso when the buff is gone.
CustomFoods.name: Auto eat custom foods
CustomFoods.tooltip: Auto eat custom foods when the buff is gone, food names are separated by commas.
EatMessageStamina: You consume {FOOD} to avoid low stamina.
EatMessageHealth: You consume {FOOD} to avoid low health.
MessageAutoBuffOn: You turn on auto eat for buff.
MessageAutoBuffOff: You turn off auto eat for buff.
